channel.title: Astronomical event of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomical event of the day.

item.title: Eclipse Island (Western Australia)
item.description: Eclipse Island is a barren island in Western Australia, 17 kilometres (10.6 mi) due south of Albany, and 6.1 km (3.8 mi) south of the nearest point of the mainland coast, which is Cave Point on the southern coast of Torndirrup Peninsula. Eclipse Island Lighthouse is located near the centre of the island. Nearby South West Island contains Western Australia's southernmost landmass.
